name: Actua Golf 3
description: You've got the perfect clubs, courses and caddy -- now you must hone your skills, judge the weather conditions and drive, chip and putt your way to victory. This classic, startlingly accurate, golf simulation will have you treading the fairways time and time again.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Graphics: Dedicated Video Graphics Storage: 600 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This Game would be great if you could just use a mouse. but if you don't mind using the keybord or have a controller might work well for you.
